short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the final price for item resale on Shopify considering all fees and profit margin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily calculate the final resale price of items on Shopify by accounting for all associated fees, shipping costs, and desired profit margins. Customize input values to fit your specific pricing strategy.
